attributes.action: refrain from spending my tax money on bailing out the car industry.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Prime Minister: Do not spend our tax money bailing out a failed car industry.

These companies have been very profitable in the past, and they should have saved some of that profit in case of situations of low demand like they are experiencing now.

As a strong believer in the free market, I'm sure the Prime Minister wouldn't want to interfere when companies fail to prepare for hardship or fail to adapt.

Perhaps the billions that it would cost to bail out these companies could be spent on public transport, or on alternative greener cars and greener methods of car production.
